resources.string: Favorite Things helps you remember and keep track of your favorite things. How many times have people asked you what your favorite book or movie is and you have drawn a blank? How much time have you wasted at the grocery store trying to remember what your favorite snack is? With Favorite Things, you will be able to answer your friends confidently and be able to be in and out of the supermarket without having to think for a second.
This is the summary of option 1
This is the summary of option 2
